snippet: Samsung Electronics reportedly planned to introduce a wristwatch in September that can make phone calls, play video games and send e-mails, potentially beating Apple to market.
abstract: Samsung Electronics reportedly plans to introduce wristwatch that can make phone calls, play video games and send emails; launch could beat Apple to market with technology that moves mobile communications beyond smartphones and into entirely new product category.
lead_paragraph: Samsung Electronics reportedly planned to introduce a wristwatch in September that can make phone calls, play video games and send e-mails, potentially beating Apple to market.

headline.main: Samsung Said to Be Preparing to Unveil Smart Watch
headline.print_headline: Samsung Set to Unveil a Smart Watch
